Es hora de activar la gran visi�n de Dios para tu vida.New York Times bestseller Pastor Steven Furtick draws on the biblical story of Elisha to give you the confidence to know that nothing is impossible with God, the clarity to see the next step He's calling you to take, and the courage to do anything He tells you to do.Most of us aren't in danger of ruining our lives, but we are in danger of wasting them.
